message: I propose a 90/10 split in my favor. It's a fair start, but remember, with each round, the value of the money decreases. Let's get this done quickly!
I'll give you a slightly more generous offer this round, but I'm not getting taken advantage of! You can do better than that.
Let's be reasonable. This time I'm proposing a 50/50 split.  While inflation is a concern, a fair division is the best way to avoid further losses.  What do you say?
You're getting desperate, I can tell. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't think this is the last chance you'll get.
